content:
A to Z of 7.4

 

  1. The entire focus of the mainstream medicine or any similar technique Acupressure, Acupuncture, Naturopathy,  is to get rid of disease or symptoms / Focus of 7.4 is to plan for cellular regeneration resulting in Health and wellbeing 

 

  1. The Mainstream Protocol is to Standardize as much as possible  / 7.4 protocol to Personalize as much as possible. 

 

  1. The Mainstream Protocol is Reductionist / 7.4 protocol is holistic.

 

  1. The Mainstream Protocol is to look for present ailments  / 7.4 protocol  though is focused on health and wellbeing . It takes care of present and future ailments too.

 

  1. The Mainstream Protocol can deal with known ailments only / 7.4 protocol   is capable of handling known and unknown ailments too. 

     

  1. The Mainstream Protocol focuses on eliminating / killing / putting into remission Germs - Bacteria - Viruses   / 7.4 protocol   strengthens Immunity which in turn takes care of Bacteria and company.

 

  1. WHO food pyramid is 15% Fats - 25% Protein - 60% carbohydrates is key to health  / 7.4 considers this pyramid is the first sin and cause of hosts of the problems hence 7.4 food pyramid is exactly reverse 60% fat - 25% protein - 15% carbohydrates.

 

  1. Synthetic Carcinogen Molecules have free permits around the world, are even recommended as health products  / 7.4 considers these molecules as a cause of concern and bans 100% , the  core principle being “ FIRST DO NO HARM”.

 

  1. Double Blind, Placebo, randomized  trials are the base of outcome of mainstream recommendations   / 7.4  derives its strength from simple equation  “Science + Logic + Experience” .

 

  1. They try to control the cell wisdom  /  We try to enroll the cell wisdom 

 

  1. Merits of the Food in question is the point to ponder for them  / Compatibility of the “Person and food”  is the real question for us.

 

  1. Sugar, Tea, Coffee, Bakery, Refined oil , preservatives have free entry in the food industry / Hospitals / Clinics / Health Centers and what not  /  We, on the other hand, oppose tooth and nail these monsters.

 

  1. Germs , Bacteria, Viruses, Kata- Vata- Pitta, Mind are the primary domain to dwell on for them  /  Body Acidosis, Man-made chemicals, FRee radicals are the areas I look into. 

 

  1. Focus of entire pharmacy / medicine is to  consider cholesterol as a root cause of heart issues and reduce it with statins  / We consider cholesterol as a healthy molecule (even high cholesterol also) and the main culprit among others, is Homocysteine. So take care of it and not get hooked to cholesterol. 

 

  1. Diabetes: It is the disease of Blood sugar levels and it matters much for them /  Diabetes is the disease of insulin resistance. Insulin is the hidden demon from our perspective. Blood sugar is just a manifestation. 

 

  1. BP: Vasodilators and diuretics are used in regulation of High BP by the mainstream  / We give prime importance to improving quality of blood vessels and  homeostasis. 

 

  1. Weight Reduction is a prime concern for the clients and consultants as well. / Health and wellbeing is our goal, weight management is a side product.  

 

  1. If you have Acidity - take Gelusil, Omez, Zantac….. Some   Antacid or the other, If you are aYoga person - Sheetali / Sheetkari / Chnadranadi Pranayam ….. Are the way out    /  For 7.4 the story is totally different - Chemical reaction completion is the core issue. Take care of that and it will take care of acidity. 

 

  1. High Uric acid:  Not to eat pulses, nonveg is the universal guideline / Whereas 80% of uric acid is generated from body cells and only 20% originates from food. So we focus on effective filtering by kidney instead of limiting the protein intake.

 

  1. Low Calcium or Vit B - They consider simple ways to recommend  Supplements /   We insist on stopping sugar consumption. Both the molecules will be spared enough so you may not need to load supplements.

 

  1. Low iron (Anemia)  - Take iron Tablets , so simple , isn't it.  /  No, it is not. Stop drinking tea and it too will  help to maintain iron absorption and ultimately anemia.  

 

  1. Stress: Stress Management / Stress Control are favorite ideas to play with / We pursue Happy Hormones and leave aside stress issues.  

 

  1. Insomnia: Simple solution is to give Sleeping tablets, keep increasing the power and that is fine for them / We plan for Melatonin upregulation and Detoxification.

  2. Loose motions: Simple way is “Ro Ko” / For us hydration is the solution ant Ro Ko.  

  3. HIgh fever:  Give antipyretic and lower the temperature / We suggest to protect the head instead.

  4. Long story short they plan Treatment /  We plan Transformation.
